mapper.insert: INSERT INTO offer (ocode, username, pcode, amount, odate) VALUES (null,#{username} ,#{pcode}, #{amount}, default)
mapper.select: SELECT o.ocode, o.pcode, o.amount, o.odate, p.pname, p.price, p.img FROM offer o JOIN product p ON o.pcode = p.pcode WHERE username = #{param1} ORDER BY o.odate DESC
